
{{alias}}( z )
    Computes the absolute value of a double-precision complex floating-point
    number.

    The absolute value of a complex number is its distance from zero.

    Parameters
    ----------
    z: Complex128
        Complex number.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Absolute value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( new {{alias:@stdlib/complex/float64/ctor}}( 5.0, 3.0 ) )
    ~5.831

    See Also
    --------
